    • Uses of ParseException in ir

      Methods in ir that throw ParseException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Compile.main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Read an IRStm sequence from a file, compile it and output files containing assembly code (output file extension .tacass) and TAC byte-code (output file extension .tac).
      static void PrettyPrint.main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Read an IR program from a file, parse and pretty-print.
      static void TreePrint.main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Read an IR program from a file, parse and generate html to render the program as a tree.
